channel.title: CVE Feed for Argo CD -- Argo CD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Argo CD -- Argo CD

item.title: CVE-2021-23135|2024-09-16T19:04:08.194Z -- argo%20cd -- argo%20cd
item.description: Exposure of System Data to an Unauthorized Control Sphere vulnerability in web UI of Argo CD allows attacker to cause leaked secret data into web UI error messages and logs. This issue affects Argo CD 1.8 versions prior to 1.8.7; 1.7 versions prior to 1.7.14.
